servinfo.title: Injection Warning Light Does Not Come ON with Ignition Switch ON and Engine at Stop

servinfosub.title: Wiring Diagram
servinfosub.ptxt: Refer to Immobilizer Control System Wiring Circuit Diagram:Diesel Engine Model .

servinfosub.title: Circuit Description
servinfosub.ptxt: When the ignition switch is turned ON, ECM transmits the indication ON signal to the combination meter to turn ON the injection warning light in case that there is not any problem with the immobilizer control system. Then, the combination meter turns ON the light. When the engine is started up, ECM transmits the indication OFF signal to the combination meter to turn OFF the light. Then, the combination meter turns OFF the injection warning light. However, in case that there is some trouble with the immobilizer control system, the injection warning light flashes ON and OFF when the ignition switch is turned ON.

testgroup.title: Injection warning light power supply check

test1.ptxt: Turn the ignition switch to ON position.

testgroup.question: Do other warning lights come ON?

test1.ptxt: Check ECM for DTC referring to DTC Check:F9Q .
Check ABS control module or ESP® control module for DTC. For ESP® model, refer to DTC Check . For non-ESP® model, refer to DTC Check .
Check BCM for DTC referring to DTC Check .

action.ptxt: Go to applicable DTC diag. flow.
Replace combination meter with a known-good one and recheck. If the injection warning light still remains OFF, replace ECM with a known-good one and recheck.

test1.ptxt: Turn the ignition switch to OFF position.
Check if any related fuse is blown.

action.ptxt: Replace blown fuse, and then check for short.

testgroup.title: Combination meter power supply wire circuit check

test1.ptxt: Remove combination meter referring to Combination Meter Removal and Installation .
Check for proper connection at wire terminals of combination meter connector.
If OK, turn the ignition switch to ON position and measure voltage between power supply terminal of combination meter and vehicle body ground referring to Combination Meter Circuit Diagram .

testgroup.question: Is it 10 – 14 V?

action.ptxt: Repair open in power supply wire circuit.

testgroup.title: Combination meter ground wire circuit check

test1.ptxt: Measure resistance between ground terminal of combination meter connector and vehicle body ground referring to Combination Meter Circuit Diagram .

testgroup.question: Is resistance 1 Ω or less?

action.ptxt: Replace combination meter with a know-good one and recheck. If the injection warning light still remains OFF, replace ECM with a known-good one and recheck.
Repair open or high resistance in ground wire circuit.
